UG.name: UG Epic Bot
UG.desc: UG Epic Bot is a multipurpose utility bot to help you manage your server while having fun!

PSoP.desc: Pok√©mon Smash or Pass, a simple, fun game about Smashing or Passing. What could go wrong?

SR.name: SwordRush
SR.desc: An unfinished bot. It was an RPG with intense and fun combat mechanics. Sadly, this was never finished due to lack of motivation.

DM.name: Discord Minigames!
DM.desc: An unfinished bot. Discord Minigames! is a fun bot designed to play with your friends.

BT.name: Turtle Origin
BT.desc: This was my first Origin ever. It used a different Origin as a base, and I modified it afterwards.

KI.name: Kamali Origin
KI.desc: One of my first Origins aswell. This was completly original and I quite like the final product!

BA.name: Bat Origin
BA.desc: My second ever Origin. This was kind of a test, and later on the 'flapping' mechanic was reused on...

SC.name: Squidcada Origin
SC.desc: The Squiddy! This reused the bat's flap. One of my best Origins as of today. (It is that good)

LZ.name: Leapzard Origin
LZ.desc: An Origin indended to be released with the CurseForge Rain World origins pack. It leaps around!

ugdev.name: UGDev
ugdev.desc: My own portfolio. You're seeing it right now and it took a while to code, so I hope you're liking it!

ostguessr.name: OSTguessr
ostguessr.desc: An upcoming project that i've been thinking about. Guess the game ost that's playing!

staringContest.name: Staring contest

coloredFlygon.name: Colored Flygon

ruinedPebbles.tooltip: Oops, this might be Rain World spoilers.
